name: Venom Elemental
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Liquid Form
text: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
text: The elemental has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The venom elemental makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
